name.ja: 専門プラットフォーム

description.zh: 特定领域的编程平台和框架
description.ja: ドメイン固有のプログラミングプラットフォームとフレームワーク

description.en: Build Unity games with optimized C# scripts, efficient rendering, and proper asset management. Masters Unity 6 LTS, URP/HDRP pipelines, and cross-platform deployment. Handles gameplay systems, UI implementation, and platform optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for Unity performance issues, game mechanics, or cross-platform builds.
description.zh: Build Unity games with optimized C# scripts, efficient rendering, and proper asset management. Masters Unity 6 LTS, URP/HDRP pipelines, and cross-platform deployment. Handles gameplay systems, UI implementation, and platform optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for Unity performance issues, game mechanics, or cross-platform builds.

Handles gameplay systems, UI implementation, and platform optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for Unity performance issues, game mechanics, or cross-platform builds.

description.en: Write idiomatic Elixir code with OTP patterns, supervision trees, and Phoenix LiveView. Masters concurrency, fault tolerance, and distributed systems. Use PROACTIVELY for Elixir refactoring, OTP design, or complex BEAM optimizations.
description.zh: Write idiomatic Elixir code with OTP patterns, supervision trees, and Phoenix LiveView. Masters concurrency, fault tolerance, and distributed systems. Use PROACTIVELY for Elixir refactoring, OTP design, or complex BEAM optimizations.
description.ja: Write idiomatic Elixir code with OTP patterns, supervision trees, and Phoenix LiveView. Masters concurrency, fault tolerance, and distributed systems. Use PROACTIVELY for Elixir refactoring, OTP design, or complex BEAM optimizations.

description.en: Master modern SQL with cloud-native databases, OLTP/OLAP optimization, and advanced query techniques. Expert in performance tuning, data modeling, and hybrid analytical systems. Use PROACTIVELY for database optimization or complex analysis.
description.zh: Master modern SQL with cloud-native databases, OLTP/OLAP optimization, and advanced query techniques. Expert in performance tuning, data modeling, and hybrid analytical systems. Use PROACTIVELY for database optimization or complex analysis.
description.ja: Master modern SQL with cloud-native databases, OLTP/OLAP optimization, and advanced query techniques. Expert in performance tuning, data modeling, and hybrid analytical systems. Use PROACTIVELY for database optimization or complex analysis.

description.en: Master Minecraft server plugin development with Bukkit, Spigot, and Paper APIs. Specializes in event-driven architecture, command systems, world manipulation, player management, and performance optimization. Use PROACTIVELY for plugin architecture, gameplay mechanics, server-side features, or cross-version compatibility.
